channel.title: {RuneDimension[OldSchool] - Perfect Combat - CastleWars - Minimal Lag}
channel.description:
[CENTER]---- RUNEDIMENSION ADVERTISEMENT THREAD -----[/CENTER] Navigation: [SIZE=4][url=http://www.runedimension.info/]The Community Website[/url] [url=http://www.runedimension.info/webclient.html] Play Now: Webclient [/url] [url=http://www.runedimension.info/RuneDimensionV1.jar] Play Now: Desktop Client(JAR) [/url][/SIZE]
Welcome to the official advertisement thread of RuneDimension.
History: RuneDimension started out as a project in August 2012 using a Deception Spawn source, turning that into an economy/eco/skill/combat/pking server. The project sadly closed down 2months after it opened. In March '03 we re-opened the project, there were a lot of complications with the source; it being originally spawn and all. I then hired a sleek developer known as Tim/Someone/Truth, who owned/developed/found Divine-Reality. As we were close friends he was happy to help. A few days later we then realised that using Deception's source was just not an option. We then decided to use Tim's source from Divine-Reality, a flawless server with amazing features and a lot rewritten for better performance.
[SIZE=5]Back to the Advertisement: PLEASE BARE IN MIND, THIS ADVERTISEMENT WAS FROM THE DIVINE-REALITY ADVERTISEMENT THREAD. 'Deception-Pkz' will reply vouching that he has agreed to us using his source and he is an active developer within the community.[/SIZE]
[CENTER]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QmRiNJl.jpg[/img] [FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=3]What do players think of some Unique features about the client (New Orbs etc)[/SIZE][/FONT]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/k0rsc3.png[/img]
[COLOR="Yellow"]Welcome to RuneDimension
NOTE: 2X EXP + 2X PKP FOR FIRST 2 WEEKS!
Why choose us?
We offer a great variety of different tasks. Something new to do. We listen to Suggestions and add them if they seem willingly to benefit the server. We have dedicated Developers to keep you happy.
We stride to keep the server as enjoyable for players. We don't want no one bored and leaving us!. We are always thinking of new ways to attract you![/COLOR]
[COLOR="Cyan"]What we have?
Dedicated SERVER 8GB Ram Flawless Combat system! A clean 317 Server with features like Castlewars! ZERO Lag Auth Vote System Great uptime/Fast forums. Highscores! Levelling up system with REWARDS! Pest control with NPCS! Amazing Bosses to choose from Amazing Economy Hunter skill; Slayer System with rewards PK system with Rewards Clipped following + Npc Clipping Dedicated Developers Friendly Owner+Staff Donator Benefits Amazing skills (all work) Quests! Cook Assistant Dragon Slayer Desert Treasure All 3 Magic spells work! Great Prayer system Great Combat + PVM
Great Economy. 8 Quests! [/COLOR]
More images [IMG]http://i1284.photobucket.com/albums/a573/Danrey94/cape_zps66d2f69f.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i1284.photobucket.com/albums/a573/Danrey94/godwars1_zps321af3ee.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1284.photobucket.com/albums/a573/Danrey94/hunting_zps27bdede7.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i1284.photobucket.com/albums/a573/Danrey94/training_zps31f1c4d2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1284.photobucket.com/albums/a573/Danrey94/mith_zps04a55202.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i1284.photobucket.com/albums/a573/Danrey94/barrows_zps28894e30.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1284.photobucket.com/albums/a573/Danrey94/rsps/thief_zps19ed5366.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i1284.photobucket.com/albums/a573/Danrey94/rsps/quest_zps95299e6e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1284.photobucket.com/albums/a573/Danrey94/rsps/skills_zpsb0ce3059.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i1284.photobucket.com/albums/a573/Danrey94/rsps/prot_zpsbe4f856f.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1284.photobucket.com/albums/a573/Danrey94/rsps/pc_zps6a79a59f.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1284.photobucket.com/albums/a573/Danrey94/rsps/mole_zpsa9d719aa.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i1284.photobucket.com/albums/a573/Danrey94/rsps/jad_zpsa0f7af3f.jpg[/img]

item.title: {RuneDimension[OldSchool] - Perfect Combat - CastleWars - Minimal Lag}
item.dc:creator: @maxii14 maxii14
item.description:
@maxii14 wrote:

Kidpaparoach:

You seem to be focusing to much on people obtaining points to buy stuff out of shops lol. Btw your titles wrong, no server in the world has zero lag.

True but we are trying our best to minimize it, so I shall edit it to Minimal Lag ;D.

Now back to a windows 4gb Dedicated host. With new cool updates to come, looking to add a good and advanced Zombie minigame.
Also adding a new clanchat base, and a login interface to help players begin and quick voting&donating!

Read full topic

item.title: {RuneDimension[OldSchool] - Perfect Combat - CastleWars - Minimal Lag}
item.dc:creator: @maxii14 maxii14
item.description:
@maxii14 wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:50, topic:508242”]I looked at your signature and said No.

Btw, have you added any Custom minigames? - Most player’s enjoy minigames.[/quote]
Yes sir, we are in the middle of developing a minigame called Antax, which the thread I mentioned in the thread I posted above.
This minigame consists of 4 pvp bosses, in which each kill gives a drop and a point(RuneDimensionPoint) Spent in the shop that will be released with the update.

Also, an RD-Token system is underway, the tokens are dropped globally, you save them up and use them in the Tokens Store to obtain items that are in the donators store… And more!

Read full topic

item.title: {RuneDimension[OldSchool] - Perfect Combat - CastleWars - Minimal Lag}
item.dc:creator: @maxii14 maxii14
item.description:
@maxii14 wrote:

You have a valid point, the thread doesn’t require a sign-up to view.
The source was given to me with the donator features being the only way to obtain ultra rares, that’s why on that thread it explains what Tim and I are working on for non-donators to earn the ultra-rares with points that will be obtained with points/tokens from skilling/pvm.

Such as a minigame and throughout skilling having points being randomly awarded in an efficient way.

Read full topic

item.title: {RuneDimension[OldSchool] - Perfect Combat - CastleWars - Minimal Lag}
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

[quote=“maxii14, post:42, topic:508242”]Great feedback!

As for a server points systems I think your should read this thread(click here).[/quote]

I tend to stay away from registering on other forums as it leaves a trail so didn’t read that sorry!

maxii14:

The server has donating bonuses yes, but all donators features can be achievable with a little challenge by all non-donators also.

So the phats etc are earned via skills/combat in some fashion/store in other words? Have you took into consideration though that will make it so the donors will make the most profit?

maxii14:

The music system is enjoyed by many members.

I think the music was good as well, maybe a little too “upbeat” for the first time player but it was decent

maxii14:

With the starter people complain that the server is too hard when they start, but after a little encouragement by our staff team they get cracking and actually enjoy the server gaming experience.

I just don’t support having pots/food in a starter. A “main” should train all skills efficiently and help to support it’s luxury adventures.

[hr]

I didn’t have much time to play yesterday but I still find the server very combat biased. You need to make skilling where it can make similar cash amounts compared to combat.

Read full topic

item.title: {RuneDimension[OldSchool] - Perfect Combat - CastleWars - Minimal Lag}
item.dc:creator: @maxii14 maxii14
item.description:
@maxii14 wrote:

Great feedback!

As for a server points systems I think your should read this thread(click here).

The server has donating bonuses yes, but all donators features can be achievable with a little challenge by all non-donators also.
The music system is enjoyed by many members.

With the starter people complain that the server is too hard when they start, but after a little encouragement by our staff team they get cracking and actually enjoy the server gaming experience.

Read full topic

item.title: {RuneDimension[OldSchool] - Perfect Combat - CastleWars - Minimal Lag}
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

I know thread hasn’t been updated in a couple of days but I was browsing and decided to give it a go so going to give some “first impression” critique.

The shops look decent but the donor shop pretty much shows that the server is going to be ran by those who donate. Unless those items are able to be gained an alternate way. (Number one rule: make it fair for everyone!)

The skills are decent xp, not too fast and not too slow.

Still testing out stuff but it’s decent the music sort of surprised me actually heh wasn’t expecting that and had my theater system on talking about being blasted.

I can also see now that it is designated more to the “pker/bosser” sort and not the regular economical view. You should instead of a pk point store make a “server point” store. To save items, to make stuff rare even combine vote points to that! “get blah amount of points for voting!”

Keep the points high so items stay rare. Swap the items out on a weekly basis. Make a couple of the items that are high priced stay in for a month and then to not come back for a year (if you stay up that long)

edit: and I liked what zeke said heh. I do sort of like the idea of having a global npc outlook. Spread out shops in more than one city.

edit #2 : personally I find the starter to be a little too much. Maybe a basic attack/strength potion for starter training, 2-3 pieces of food for the common noob, but besides that… shouldn’t really get much. Make them work for it!

Read full topic

item.title: {RuneDimension[OldSchool] - Perfect Combat - CastleWars - Minimal Lag}
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“maxii14, post:24, topic:508242”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=626480.msg4261652#msg4261652 date=1363522658]
Try to keep things professional on your thread, if people want to argue then click the report to a moderator link and it’ll be removed. If you’re unprofessional on your thread then a lot of the more mature players won’t come to your server. Good luck.
[/quote]
You’re right, but if people got to know me I bet they would like me, and the server.[/quote]
People are here to find a server to play, not to get to know you. This is why I said I’m not gonna join, I assume if you’re running a server you understand it’s almost like a job since you’re taking people’s time and possibly money if they donate. This is why when you work at, let’s say a convenient store, you can’t just insult customers. I would 100% leave the store if I got shit for being fat or ugly or whatever else from the cashier. You just don’t do it.

Read full topic
